edu.asu.spring.quadriga.service

Interface IQuadrigaRoleManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    QuadrigaRoleManager

    public interface IQuadrigaRoleManager
    Interface class that places restraints on the QuadrigaRoleManager class to implement the required behaviors.
    Author:
    Ram Kumar Kumaresan

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Method to get the QuadrigaRole object based on RoleId.

    • Method Detail

      • setQuadrigaRoles

        void setQuadrigaRoles(java.util.List<IQuadrigaRoles> quadrigaRoles)
        Method to set the QuadrigaRoles list.
        Parameters:
        quadrigaRoles - The list of QuadrigaRoles which will be used by the QuadrigaRoleManager

      • getQuadrigaRole

        IQuadrigaRoles getQuadrigaRole(java.lang.String sQuadrigaRoleDBId)
        Method to get the QuadrigaRole object based on RoleId.
        Parameters:
        sQuadrigaRoleDBId - The RoleId for which the corresponding QuadrigaRole object should be returned
        Returns:
        The corresponding QuadrigaRole object.
